timatedWeight>.###`| | |predictedPayload| |`predictedPayload`|`predictedpayload`| | # Flight Plan Fuel Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * :paperclip: Flight Plan Data Retrieval #### - Source Directory * :paperclip: Flight Plan Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps * :paperclip: Flight Plan Data Retrieval #### - Data Handling Operation * `legId` is retrieved from the RiverX Flight Leg Data Model using the values mapped according to the following conditions; * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.` = Flight Leg Data Model `udor` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.` = Flight Leg Data Model `carrier` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.` = Flight Leg Data Model `flightNumber` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.` = Flight Leg Data Model `suffix` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.` = Flight Leg Data Model `departureAirport` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.` = Flight Leg Data Model `arrivalAirport` * Flight Leg Data Model `statusCode` <> “CNL“ and “DEL“ #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `legId` * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed, as the source system does not delete Flight Plan Fuel records. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source File|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | | |legId|                              | |Data Handling Operation| |fuelForMelItem|`###-std.xml`|`.....###`|When `` is not exist for `reason="DEV"`,
the field is set to “0“.| |fuelForMelItemTimeEquivalance|`###-std.xml`|`..
